title: Are Aaatrox and Rhaast friends?
body:
Aatrox  and Rhaast are both darkins right? 
So are they friends or are they ennemies?

replies.body: They're 'coworkers' of their realm. Think of them that way. Initially, they came into Runeterra with a goal-- destruction, death, war, mayhem. But how they achieve it, is where their differences lie. They've not seen each other for a while, so any grudges, points of contention or unresolved arguments would likely fester and grow. Forgiveness isn't Rhaast's thing. I would think that Aatrox would have little room for it either. I do think they would argue about who is the leader. And I wouldn't want to be anywhere near them when they argue.
How does Varus view them? We know he's looking for his ally, and he seems more prideful and vengeful about his people.

> [{quoted}](name=CoolRadius,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5f4ZRxdX,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-01-17T00:56:52.854+0000)
>
> They're 'coworkers' of their realm. Think of them that way. Initially, they came into Runeterra with a goal-- destruction, death, war, mayhem. But how they achieve it, is where their differences lie. They've not seen each other for a while, so any grudges, points of contention or unresolved arguments would likely fester and grow. Forgiveness isn't Rhaast's thing. I would think that Aatrox would have little room for it either. I do think they would argue about who is the leader. And I wouldn't want to be anywhere near them when they argue.

can we get cinematic of these two fighting, please riot!
that animatic would be just a second where aatrox wedges rhasst in a log and chucks him off the side of a mountain. done a million views.
The Darkin rule but I don't necessarily know if they are friends. Possibly just allies?

I mean, I'd assume they're all on the same side - obviously not enemies.

Individually, though, I believe they would all have different relationship dynamics with each other. Some might resent Varus as the leader; Varus might be condescending; one might be the beta; one might be the omega; two may be 'bash brothers'. (I'm just rattling off generic tropes over here).

> [{quoted}](name=DarkSoul1994,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5f4ZRxdX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-09T16:31:17.518+0000)
>
> I mean, I'd assume they're all on the same side - obviously not enemies.
> 
> Individually, though, I believe they would all have different relationship dynamics with each other. Some might resent Varus as the leader; Varus might be condescending; one might be the beta; one might be the omega; two may be 'bash brothers'. (I'm just rattling off generic tropes over here).
  

From Rhaast's interactions with Aatrox it seems like Aatrox is the leader.
mm i thought they were brothers?
Well, they have history according to Rhaast. Varus wants to assemble all 5 darkin, so he would probably be friendly toward all of thjem.
Given Rhaast's dialogue when taking over kayn and attacking or killing aatrox they don't sound like friends.
